short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Image Censorship Tool for the Web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to iCensr, your ultimate solution for web image detection and censorship! With iCensr, you can browse the web worry-free, knowing that inappropriate or harmful content is filtered out before it reaches your screen. Say goodbye to stumbling upon disturbing images or videosâ€”iCensr has got you covered!


-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
If you intend to use our plugin with the "local" mode, here are the download links for the iCensr Local Server and iCensr Local Server (Light):

iCensr Local Server: [Google Drive Link](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1MHEtU5sO1H6kbAlktBXxcmv1zQHMyLg6/view?usp=sharing)
iCensr Local Server (Light): [Google Drive Link](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HjX7n0F8HHJXRjDl-7qkh7GTNRRXgWCU/view?usp=sharing)

You can also visit our website at "https://icensr.000webhostapp.com/" for more information about this project.
